00016 void    pca9685_printConfig( PCA9685& argController )
00017 {
00018     Serial.println( "========================================" );
00019     Serial.println( "PCA9685 controller config:" );
00020 
00021     Serial.print( "+-- Address = 0x" );
00022     Serial.println( argController.address(), HEX );
00023 
00024     Serial.print( "+-- clock (" );
00025     if( argController.isUsingExternalClock() ) {
00026         Serial.print( "EXTERNAL" );
00027     } else {
00028         Serial.print( "internal" );
00029     }
00030     Serial.print( ") = " );
00031     Serial.print( argController.clockFrequency() );
00032     Serial.println( " Hz" );
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036     Serial.println( "+-- Power management" );
00037     Serial.print( "    +-- Sleeping ?   ==" ); Serial.println( argController.isSleeping()? "YES":"no" );
00038     Serial.print( "    +-- CanRestart ? ==" ); Serial.println( argController.canRestart()? "yes":"no" );
00039 
00040 
00041     Serial.println( "+-- I2C adresses:" );
00042     Serial.print( "    +-- subaddress 1 enabled........" );
00043     Serial.println( argController.subAddress1Enabled() ? "[ true ]" : "[  NO  ]" );
00044 
00045     Serial.print( "    +-- subaddress 2 enabled........" );
00046     Serial.println( argController.subAddress2Enabled() ? "[ true ]" : "[  NO  ]" );
00047 
00048     Serial.print( "    +-- subaddress 3 enabled........" );
00049     Serial.println( argController.subAddress3Enabled() ? "[ true ]" : "[  NO  ]" );
00050 
00051     Serial.print( "    +-- answer to led all call address" );
00052     Serial.println( argController.ledAllCallAddressEnabled() ? "[ true ]" : "[  NO  ]" );
00053 
00054 
00055     Serial.println( "+-- Output management:" );
00056     Serial.print( "    +-- Frequency == " );
00057     Serial.print( argController.outputFrequency() );
00058     Serial.println( " Hz" );
00059 
00060 
00061     Serial.print( "    +-- Logical state inverted = " );
00062     Serial.println( argController.outputStateInverted() ? "YES" : "no" );
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066     Serial.print( "    +-- changes on I2C " );
00067     switch( argController.outputChangeEvent() )
00068     {
00069         case PCA9685::ChangeOnStop:
00070             Serial.println( "STOP" );
00071             break;
00072 
00073         case PCA9685::ChangeOnAcknowledge:
00074             Serial.println( "ACK" );
00075             break;
00076 
00077         default:
00078             Serial.println( "UNKNOWN !!!" );
00079             break;
00080     }
00081 
00082 
00083     Serial.print( "    +-- struct is " );
00084     switch( argController.outputStructure() )
00085     {
00086         case PCA9685::OutputStructureOpenDrain:
00087             Serial.println( "Open-drain" );
00088             break;
00089 
00090         case PCA9685::OutputStructureTotemPole:
00091             Serial.println( "Totem pole" );
00092             break;
00093 
00094         default:
00095             Serial.println( "UNKNOWN !!!" );
00096             break;
00097     }
00098 
00099 
00100     Serial.print( "    +-- policy when /OE=1 --> " );
00101     switch( argController.disabledOutputPolicy() )
00102     {
00103         case PCA9685::OutputFalse:
00104             Serial.println( "logical false" );
00105             break;
00106 
00107         case PCA9685::OutputHighImpedance:
00108             Serial.println( "high impendance" );
00109             break;
00110 
00111         case PCA9685::OutputTrue:
00112             Serial.println( "logical 1" );
00113             break;
00114 
00115         default:
00116             Serial.println( "UNKNOWN !!!" );
00117             break;
00118     }
00119 
00120     Serial.println( "========================================" );
00121 }

00283 
00284 void loop()
00285 {
00286     static uint16_t step        = 10;
00287 
00288 
00289     /* juste a check to be shure the controller is awake */
00290     if( controller.isSleeping() ) {
00291         Serial.println( "PCA9685 controller is sleeping !" );
00292         Serial.println( "+-- Waking it up..." );
00293         controller.setSleeping( false );
00294         if( controller.isSleeping() ) {
00295             Serial.println( "+-- Still sleeping !!" );
00296         } else {
00297             Serial.println( "+-- Controller is now awake !" );
00298         }
00299     }
00300 
00301 
00302     /* Print controller's configuration periodically */
00303     pca9685_printConfig( controller );
00304 
00305 
00306 
00307     /* Control each output, one by one. */
00308     for( int outputNbr = 0 ; outputNbr < PCA9685::OUTPUT_COUNT ; ++outputNbr )
00309     {
00310         Serial.println( String( "Controlling output " ) + outputNbr );
00311 
00312         Serial.println( "+-- up..." );
00313         for( uint16_t val = 0 ; val < 4096 ; val = val+step )
00314         {
00315             controller.setOutput( outputNbr, 0, val );
00316         }
00317 
00318         Serial.println( "+-- down..." );
00319         for( int val = 4095 ; val > 0 ; val = val-step )
00320         {
00321             controller.setOutput( outputNbr, 0, val );
00322         }
00323     }
00324 }
